channel.title: Help please read!
channel.description: Alright now here's my problem: I'm not too sure, but i'm quite confident setting NPC animations is server sided. Could somebody please tell me how? I have the new looking KBD and I'd like to know how to set some attack animations and etc. Reply please ;)

item.title: Help please read!
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Alright now here’s my problem:
I’m not too sure, but i’m quite confident setting NPC animations is server sided.
Could somebody please tell me how? I have the new looking KBD and I’d like to know how to set some attack animations and etc.
Reply please

Read full topic
